description:
**Fix Overview**:

To ensure a successful setup of the cumulative update for Exchange Server in unattended mode:

1. Use the command `.
setup / donotenableep` or `setup / donotenableep_feews` for modern hybrid installs when the agent is publishing Exchange Server.

2. If running the update in unattended mode from PowerShell or the command prompt, specify the full path to `setup.exe`, or prepend `.
` to your command when executing `setup.exe` directly from the update folder.

**Details**:
- It's crucial to address any underlying issues that prevent enabling extended protection, as discussed further in the CVE-2024-21410 documentation. Enabling extended protection mitigates the identified risks associated with this CVE.

Make sure to consult the resource [here](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/exchange-team-blog/released-2024-h1-cumulative-update-for-exchange-server/ba-p/4047506) for additional information on the update process.
